output: pdf_document
---



```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
```



```{r}
load("wrangled_data/weeklies1.RData")
```

```{r}
weeklies1$time <- as.POSIXct(weeklies1$time)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = weeklies1, aes(x = time, y = opened)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth() + 
  ggtitle("Open Percentage over Time, 2019-2020") + 
  xlab("Month") +
  ylab("Open Percentage")
  scale_x_datetime(labels = date_format("%m/%y"), 
               breaks = date_breaks("2 month"))
  
```
